results.title: Chronic unilateral chemosis following the use of amlodipine besylate
results.text_hl: He had been treated for @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@ for the previous 5 months with once daily @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine besylate@@@/@CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_amlodipine_atorvastatin_drug_combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:C487936 @@@Caduet@@@) and @CHEMICAL_candesartan_cilexetil @CHEMICAL_MESH:C077793 @@@candesartan cilexetil@@@ (Atacand).

citations.NLM: Kim KH, Kim WS. Chronic unilateral chemosis following the use of amlodipine besylate BMC Ophthalmol. 2014 Oct 21;14():124. PMID: 25335530
citations.BibTeX: @article{25335530, title={Chronic unilateral chemosis following the use of amlodipine besylate}, author={Kim KH and Kim WS}, journal={BMC Ophthalmol}, volume={14}, pages={124}}
